DarwinShinyModules 0.0.1
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Creating a new Module

    TreatmentPatterns

    TreatmentPatterns.Rd

    TreatmentPatterns super class. Composed of a PlotWidget and Table modules. This class is an interface and is not meant to be directly used, but to be inherited.

    Super class

    DarwinShinyModules::ShinyModule -> TreatmentPatterns

    Active bindings

    data

    Data to plot with, usually a data.frame-like object.

    widget

    (PlotWidget) Module

    table

    (Table) Module

    inputs

    (reactiveValues) environment

    Method server()

    Method to handle the back-end.

    Method clone()

    The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

    Arguments

    Whether to make a deep clone.
